shelfButtonInfos.label: import takTools.comm...k_misc.selEveryNUI()
shelfButtonInfos.command:
import takTools.common.tak_misc as tak_misc
import imp
imp.reload(tak_misc)
tak_misc.selEveryNUI()

shelfButtonInfos.label: polySelectSp -ring;...polySelectSp -ring;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Selects all parallel edges that form an edge ring based on the current selection

shelfButtonInfos.label: polySelectSp -loop;...polySelectSp -loop;
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Selects all connected edges that form an edge loop based on the current selection
